messages.subject: SATs for young people Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] re: 14 year olds was new  member intro
messages.msgSnippet: ... I, too, took the SATs as a privilege when I was about to enter 7th grade.  I can t at all remember what the numbers were, but they were higher than most
messages.messageBody:
> I'm actually shocked and appalled that anyone would even think of giving
> high school SAT's to grade schoolers.

I, too, took the SATs as a "privilege" when I was about to enter 7th
grade. I can't at all remember what the numbers were, but they were
higher than most people entering college. I was congratulated, etc.,
but my question was "Why did I have to go to junior high and high school
then?" I never got that answered, but I was "allowed" to graduate
fairly young.

-Lisa
